alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greene; Western Greene (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:23PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Greene County through 215 PM EDT... At 122 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North-South Lake Campground, or 8 miles west of Catskill, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, penny size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water. Locations impacted include... Coxsackie, North-South Lake Campground, Cairo, Greenville Center, West Coxsackie, Round Top, Result, Earlton, Sanfords Corners, Limestreet, Kiskatom, Sunside, Climax, Cairo Junction, Place Corners, Three Town Bridge, Medway, South Durham, Athens Station and Leeds. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 21 and 21B. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
